definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Mary teaches religion. However, she is an atheist. She has an excellent sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗教宗教，但她自己卻是個無神論者。

sentences.english: Atheists deny the existence of God.
sentences.chinese: 無神論者不相信上帝的存在。

sentences.english: If a person wants to be atheistic , it's his God-given right to be an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個人想成爲無神論者，那也是上帝給他的權利。

sentences.english: Xiong Bolong was a distinguished atheist of China in 17th century.
sentences.chinese: 熊伯龍是十七世紀我國傑出的無神論者。

sentences.english: Atheists have the highest writing proficiency of any religious or nonreligious group.
sentences.chinese: 在各宗教與非宗教團體中無神論者的寫作能力最強。

sentences.english: So atheism and agnosticism became the fashion of the day.
sentences.chinese: 無神論和不可知論成爲了當時的時尚。

sentences.english: When it comes to planning, many Christians act like atheists.
sentences.chinese: 一談到打算，很多基督徒都表現得像無神論者。

sentences.english: Dont doubt about this though they state themselves antitheists.
sentences.chinese: 不要懷疑，雖說他們都是無神論者。

sentences.english: Only the Atheist can be a consistent Secularist .
sentences.chinese: 只有無神論者可以一個一致的世俗。

sentences.english: I was an atheist and evolutionist most of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我大半輩子都是個無神論進化論者。

sentences.english: Because they thought that his treatise of human nature was atheistic.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們認爲休謨關於人性的理論屬於無神論體系。

sentences.english: Relating to or characteristic of atheism or atheists.
sentences.chinese: 無神論者就沒有這樣的引導。

sentences.english: It is often cynically said that there are no atheists in foxholes.
sentences.chinese: 很諷刺的是，在散兵坑裏沒有無神論者。

sentences.english: He's an atheist, she pretty much agnostic.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名無神論者，她則基本上是不可知論者。

sentences.english: Atheists do not believe in God.
sentences.chinese: 無神論者從來不相信有上帝。

sentences.english: I have found it is difficult to make a religious connection with atheists.
sentences.chinese: 我發現很難與無神論者建立宗教性的聯結。

definition: philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
materialism, philosophical doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
